content: these stitches in the next round small heart crochet hook 2 5 mm catania originals light pink t0048 crochet in spiral stuff with polyester filling as you go r1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 r8 18 single_crochet in one side 18 single_crochet in other side 36 r2 increase x 6 times 12 r9 single_crochet in all 36 st 36 r3 single_crochet increase x 6 times 18 r10 4 single_crochet decrease x 6 times 30 r4 2 single_crochet increase x 6 times 24 r5-r7 single_crochet in all 24 st - 3 rounds 24 where we crocheted the two parts together there will be a small hole which we will now sew cut the yarn first make another one the same closed way but do not cut the yarn on the second half smoozy crochet patterns all rights reserved 8 r11 single_crochet in all 30 st 30 r12 3 single_crochet decrease x 6 times 24 r13-r14 single_crochet in all 24 st - 2 rounds 24 r15 2 single_crochet decrease x 6 times 18 r16 single_crochet in all 18 st 18 😀 your cute valentine s heart is now ready r17 single_crochet decrease x 6 times 12 r18 single_crochet in all 12 st 12 i hope that you had fun making your toy / gift r19 2 single_crochet decrease x 3 times 9 💝 💝 💝 r20 single_crochet decrease x 3 times 6 close the circle by pulling through the front loop only if you have any questions or need any 🙂 assistance please don t hesitate to ask you can sell the finished figure just please credit me as the designer 🙂 sew the small heart on to the hands of the big heart smoozy crochet patterns all rights reserved 9 you can find me my other english patterns are available to purchase in my etsy shop here are a few examples @smoozycrochetpatterns new patterns are added frequently @smoozy crochetpatterns 🙂 @smoozycrochetpatterns thank you for your support @smoozycrochetpatterns @smoozycrochetpattern smoozy crochet patterns all rights reserved 10 smoozy crochet patterns all rights reserved 11 smoozy crochet patterns all rights reserved
